text: Ureueng meuiman geukheun dum teuma Pakon roe hana Neubri peurintah Pakon roe hana Neupeutron surat â€˜Oh ban tron surat nyan pih ka susah Surat nyang teugas geuyue jak meuprang Takalon yoh nyan na nyang geulisah Nyang na peunyaket dalam atejih Sang-sang taeu jih pingsan ka reubah Jikalon gata sang jih ka pingsan Mate beu rijang meunan sang ulah Nyang got that di jih roe watee nyan
